pkgmetadata.longdescription: This version of Adventure Game Studio (AGS) contains changes from the version published by Chris Jones. The run-time engine was ported to Android, iOS, Linux, Mac OS X and PSP and a refactoring effort is under way. A detailed documentation of the changes is provided in the form of the git log of this git repository.

use.flag: Enable MIDI music with Eric A. Welsh's GUS patch set
